content:
Can I import files with - in their names? I am getting an error for import Fad.Chapter1-Ex. What the notation «Name» means in the example https://github.com/leanprover/lean4/tree/master/src/lake#creating-and-building-a-package?

I didn't find any information about import in the https://lean-lang.org/lean4/doc/, so please if I missed any documentation, I am sorry.
the answer to your first question is your second question
the syntax «Name» is for writing identifiers with characters that are not normal identifier characters, including -. So you would write import Fad.«Chapter1-Ex» in this case
My mistake was to try «Fad.Chapter1-Ex» and probably I didn’t pay attention to the error message.
Alexandre Rademaker has marked this topic as resolved.
